name: Stop & Shop Real Premium Ice Cream Vanilla
desc: Ahold Vanilla Real Premium Ice Cream. Amount and % daily value per serving. Calories 140. Fat 8g, 12%. See nutrition facts for saturated fat content. 1-877-846-9949. Quality guaranteed or your money back. Real. Ice cream is our passion. Our meticulous process of making it is second to none. Our ice cream is sampled daily for quality and perfection of flavor. Our sincere commitment to quality ensures you an outstanding product. So experience a taste we've built our reputation on. We promise great taste and fun in every bowl. 2011 Ahold Licensing, Sarl.
